p: In order to validate the differential expression results obtained by RNA-seq, we performed a RT-qPCR analysis of DcMYB6 and DcMYB7 and their corresponding lncNATs ( asDcMYB6and asDcMYB7). As shown in Fig.Â 4, the expression of the four genes was detected by RNA-seq and RT-qPCR in all purple samples, being mostly undetected in orange tissues. Moreover, both techniques allowed the detection of gene expression in orange tissues only for DcMYB6, displaying significantly lower values than in purple tissues. The comparative RT-qPCR expression of the four genes in purple phloem and xylem tissues is presented in Supplementary Figure S3.
